Traffic

This object is available in the optional “traffic” package.

Summary
TrafficThis object is available in the optional “traffic” package.
MQA.TrafficCreates a traffic object which encapsulates all the traffic functionality.
Functions
addFlowDisplays the flow image on the map.
removeFlowHides the traffic flow image.
addMarketsDisplays market POIs on the map.
removeMarketsRemoves market POIs from the map
addIncidentsDisplays incident POIs on the map.
removeIncidentsRemoves incident POIs from the map
isAvailableReturns the state of the traffic service
refreshRefreshes the traffic display

MQA.Traffic

Creates a traffic object which encapsulates all the traffic functionality.

Parameters

map(MQA.TileMap) The map which will display the traffic information.

Extends

MQA.Base

Properties

These properties can be manipulated via the MQA.Base.setValue, MQA.Base.setValues, and MQA.Base.getValue functions.

flowOpacity(float) The opacity of the flow image.
severityColors(array) 5-element array of strings denoting hex colors of the 5 severity levels.
severityText(array) 5-element array of string denoting text of the 5 severity levels.
incidentIcons(array) 5-element array of MQA.Icon objects, each icon representing a severity level.
eventIcons(array) 5-element array of MQA.Icon objects, each icon representing a severity level.
constructionIcons(array) 5-element array of MQA.Icon objects, each icon representing a severity level.
marketIcon(MQA.Icon) The icon to represent a market POI.
maxInfoWindowWidth(int) The max width in pixels of a traffic-related InfoWindow.
incidentTitleCallback(string) The callback function used to customize the rollover window content for incident POIs.  The callback function should take a data object as a parameter and return a string.
incidentContentCallback(string) The callback function used to customize the InfoWindow content for incident POIs The callback function should take a data object as a parameter and return a string.
marketTitleCallback(string) The callback function used to customize the rollover window content for market POIs.  The callback function should take a data object as a parameter and return a string.
marketContentCallback(string) The callback function used to customize the InfoWindow content for market POIs.  The callback function should take a data object as a parameter and return a string.
infoWindowTitleCallback(string) The callback function used to customize the InfoWindow title bar text for incident POIs.  The callback function should take a data object as a parameter and return a string.
incidentTypeFilter(array) Array of incident types to display.  Constants to use are MQA.TRAFFIC_CONSTRUCTION, MQA.TRAFFIC_EVENTS, and MQA.TRAFFIC_INCIDENTS.
